original: intros m k x Hinv Hsucc. induction m. - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct e0. -- simpl. rewrite IHm. reflexivity. auto. -- simpl. destruct (eq_dim_dec d k). ++ destruct (eq_dart_dec d0 x). ** inversion Hinv as [Hinv1 _]. apply IHm in Hinv1. auto. ** apply IHm. inversion Hinv as [Hinv1 _]. auto. ++ apply IHm. inversion Hinv as [Hinv1 _]. auto.
